mapper.select: SELECT t1.Customer_ID, t1.Abbrev, t1.Customer_Na, t1.PractiseDate, t1.ShutOutDate, t1.FictitiousPerson, t1.TaxNumber, t1.Keyman, t1.Mobile, t1.Email, t1.Fax, t1.Tel1, t1.Tel2, t1.cGroup, t1.Company_ID, t1.OrganizationID, t1.Country, t1.Region, t1.Province, t1.City, t1.Address, t1.Zipcode, t1.Mathod, t1.DealInPattern, t1.cLevel, t1.Sort, t1.SaleMan, t1.PropertyLevel, t1.Saletarget, t1.Fee, t1.cArea, t1.Deposit, t1.Remark, t1.Credit, t1.AccountCustomer_ID, t1.AccountCustomerFlag, t1.DpPriceType, t1.BalancePriceType, t1.BalancePriceGetFromGoods, t1.Fdiscount, t1.MarketPlaceDiscount, t1.QiExchangeRate, t1.QiExchangeCyc, t1.ExchangeRate, t1.ExchangeCyc, t1.ExchangeFirst, t1.SPromoBeforeVip, t1.SortCycDays, t1.NoSPromoScale, t1.VipUseGroup, t1.StockQueryGroup, t1.BusinessManGroup, t1.ShutOut, t1.Input_Date, t1.UpdateTimestamp, t1.AllowMinusStock, t1.Shops_ID, t1.Item, t1.Flag, t1.Warehouse_No, t1.Calulate, t1.FormulaId, t1.OverCrdt, t1.IsCheckBalanceMode, t1.PrintPosSmallBill, t1.RepOffice_ID, t1.IsAutoBuildBill, t1.CompanyPriceFlag, t1.AccountCompany_ID, t1.IsEmporium, t1.NotIntegral, t1.NotDiscount, t1.NotSendMobileMsg, t1.Tag, t1.CustomerGroup, t1.IsQuotaManage, t1.CheckMinusStockWhenPosDayBalance, t1.IsUseUnitPrice, t1.IsMall, t1.MultiSelectRenotice, t1.MultiSelectShopApplyOut, t1.UseArea, t1.ShopTopArea, t1.ShopAfterArea, t1.ContractArea, t1.ShopLocation1, t1.ShopLocation2, t1.StandardStockQt, t1.StandardAreaRate, t1.ContractBeginDate, t1.ContractEndDate, t1.SecurityAmount, t1.ControlMan, t1.ShopStaffing, t1.BillingCycle, t1.Division, t1.DivisionLevel, t1.OwnBrand, t1.IsCalcCost, t1.Insurance, t1.GiftCardUseGroup, t1.LinkMan, t1.VipStoredGroup, t1.BRID, t2.Company_Na AS companyName, t3.Organization AS organizationName, t4.Customer_Na parentCustomerName FROM customer t1 LEFT JOIN company t2 ON t1.Company_ID = t2.Company_ID LEFT JOIN rightorganization t3 ON t1.OrganizationID = t3.ID LEFT JOIN customer t4 ON t1.ParentChannelID = t4.Customer_ID where t1.Customer_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
